intro:
Hello, Employee #4479. Welcome to your new position here at Schrodinger Inc.!


Press Enter...
You have been entrusted with the care of Cheshire, our office cat
However, he's locked in this box. And, under no condition, are you permitted to look inside.
To interact with the box, you have access to this console. You can submit instructions for the day, and a report will be generated.
Currently, the console can control the caloric enrichment dispenser, and metabolic byproduct remover.
The box has been set upon a mass scale. For your convenience, this data is connected to your terminal.
It is up to you to ensure that Cheshire is alive. Good Luck!
